page.title: 07ASHDON CRICKET CLUB.
page.content: Wednesday.The average Sunday congregation is 20. Sister Kay also organises a fortnightly youth club and a womens own (club). She also runs a Sunday School for children. At the moment there are 15 members and 3 teachers. {ASHDON CRICKET CLUB The cricket club was probably formed about a 100years ago.The club,in its present form,has existed for about 25 years.Matches are played at Waltons Park and currently the membership is approximately 35.It plays about 44 friendly games per season in addition to 10 in the Mid week league.The club also enters the village cup which it won in 1982 and 1983.The team draws its members from Ashdon in the main but there are several players who live outside the village.Those living outside the village have usually got
